title: Lotte Duty Free Da Nang downtown store pre-opening concert
text:
By  Elena Dimama 
in  Asia/Pacific, Downtown, Latest News, Regions, Retail News
August 28, 2019 Comments Off on Lotte Duty Free Da Nang downtown store pre-opening concert The new shop, Lotte’s fourth in Vitnam, is set to open within this year Lotte Phu Khanh Duty Free has held a pre-opening concert for the Da Nang downtown store, the first duty free store in the central coast of Vietnam, set to open within this year. The concert drew a crowd of over 4,000 and featured K-POP boy group NCT Dream and popular Vietnamese figures including Min, Erik, Amee and Suni Ha Linh. The Da Nang downtown store will be Lotte’s fourth in Vietnam, after the Danang Airport store, which opened in May 2017, Nha Trang Cam Ranh Airport store in June 2018, and the Hanoi Airport store in July 2019.  Located at the centre of the city, the store is expected to offer a “world-class” shopping destination for the region of Hoi An, Hue and Da Nang, featuring both global and local merchandise. Lotte will also offer customers the opportunity to buy products at the store and pick them up later at the airport. CEO of Lotte Phu Khanh Duty Free Suk Won Park said: “Lotte Duty Free Da Nang Downtown Store will be a new foundation for the tourism industry in Da Nang. The store will provide luxurious and unique shopping experience to customers as housing both global and local merchandise. “Utilizing K-wave or Hallyu, the big phenomenon in Vietnam, and through all our activities, we believe we can contribute to the development of the city’s tourism and economy. We will be also involved in the local community, creating new jobs and implementing CSR activities. Tagged with: Lotte Duty Free
